hibernate-mapping.query: select new LOMDTO00021 ( MAX(l.Id) ) from MNMORM00017 as l

select new LOMDTO00021( l.Id, l.LNo, l.Acctno, l.Q1, l.Q2, l.Q3, l.Q4, l.QBal1, l.QBal2, l.QBal3, l.QBal4, l.UserNo, l.ACSign, l.CloseDate, l.Budget, l.UId, l.SourceBr, l.Cur, l.Active, l.TS, l.CreatedUserId, l.CreatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId, l.UpdatedDate ) from MNMORM00017 as l where l.Active = true and l.SourceBr=:SourceBranchCode

select new LOMDTO00021( l.Id, l.LNo, l.Acctno, l.IntRate, l.Repaymentoption, l.Duration, l.CloseDate, l.Budget, l.SourceBr, l.Cur ) from MNMORM00017 as l where l.Active = true and l.LNo = :lno and l.SourceBr = :SourceBranchCode
update MNMORM00017 l set l.QBal1 = :samt, l.UpdatedUserId=:updatedUserID, l.UpdatedDate=:updatedDate where l.LNo = :lno and l.SourceBr=:SourceBranchCode and l.Active = true
update MNMORM00017 l set l.QBal2 = :samt, l.UpdatedUserId=:updatedUserID, l.UpdatedDate=:updatedDate where l.LNo = :lno and l.SourceBr=:SourceBranchCode and l.Active = true
update MNMORM00017 l set l.QBal3 = :samt, l.UpdatedUserId=:updatedUserID, l.UpdatedDate=:updatedDate where l.LNo = :lno and l.SourceBr=:SourceBranchCode and l.Active = true
update MNMORM00017 l set l.QBal4 = :samt, l.UpdatedUserId=:updatedUserID, l.UpdatedDate=:updatedDate where l.LNo = :lno and l.SourceBr=:SourceBranchCode and l.Active = true

update MNMORM00017 li set
li.UpdatedUserId=:UpdatedUserID, li.UpdatedDate=:updatedDate where li.LNo = :lno and li.SourceBr=:sourceBr and li.Active = true

update MNMORM00017 l set l.Q1=:month, l.Q2=:month, l.Q3=:month, l.Q4=:month, l.QBal1=:month, l.QBal2=:month, l.QBal3=:month, l.QBal4=:month, l.Budget=:budget, l.UpdatedUserId=:updatedUserId, l.UpdatedDate=:updatedDate where l.SourceBr=:SourceBranchCode and l.Active = true

select new LOMDTO00021( l.Id, l.LNo, l.Acctno, l.Q1, l.Q2, l.Q3, l.Q4, l.QBal1, l.QBal2, l.QBal3, l.QBal4, l.UserNo, l.ACSign, l.CloseDate, l.Budget, l.UId, l.SourceBr, l.Cur, l.Active, l.TS, l.CreatedUserId, l.CreatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId, l.UpdatedDate ) from MNMORM00017 as l where l.Acctno = :accountNo and l.Active = true
update MNMORM00017 l set l.Q1 = :samt, l.UpdatedUserId=:UpdatedUserID, l.UpdatedDate=:updatedDate where l.LNo = :lno and l.SourceBr=:SourceBranchCode and l.Active = true
update MNMORM00017 l set l.Q2 = :samt, l.UpdatedUserId=:UpdatedUserID, l.UpdatedDate=:updatedDate where l.LNo = :lno and l.SourceBr=:SourceBranchCode and l.Active = true
update MNMORM00017 l set l.Q3 = :samt, l.UpdatedUserId=:UpdatedUserID, l.UpdatedDate=:updatedDate where l.LNo = :lno and l.SourceBr=:SourceBranchCode and l.Active = true
update MNMORM00017 l set l.Q4 = :samt, l.UpdatedUserId=:UpdatedUserID, l.UpdatedDate=:updatedDate where l.LNo = :lno and l.SourceBr=:SourceBranchCode and l.Active = true

select new LOMDTO00021( l.Id, l.LNo, l.Acctno, l.IntRate, l.Q1, l.Q2, l.Q3, l.Q4, l.QBal1, l.QBal2, l.QBal3, l.QBal4, l.UserNo, l.ACSign, l.CloseDate, l.Duration, l.Budget, l.UId, l.SourceBr, l.Cur, l.Active, l.TS, l.CreatedUserId, l.CreatedDate, l.UpdatedUserId, l.UpdatedDate ) from MNMORM00017 as l where l.Acctno = :accountNo and l.LNo = :lno and l.SourceBr = :sourceBr and (l.CloseDate is null or l.CloseDate = '') and l.Active = true

select new LOMDTO00021( c.Id, c.LNo, c.Acctno, c.IntRate, c.Q1, c.Q2, c.Q3, c.Q4, c.QBal1, c.QBal2, c.QBal3, c.QBal4, c.UserNo, c.ACSign, c.CloseDate, c.Duration, c.Budget, c.UId, c.SourceBr, c.Cur, c.Active, c.TS, c.CreatedUserId, c.CreatedDate, c.UpdatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate ) from MNMORM00017 as c where c.Acctno = :accountNo and c.LNo = :loanNo and c.Active = true and (c.CloseDate = null or c.CloseDate = '')

select new LOMDTO00021( c.Id, c.LNo, c.Acctno, c.IntRate, c.Q1, c.Q2, c.Q3, c.Q4, c.QBal1, c.QBal2, c.QBal3, c.QBal4, c.UserNo, c.ACSign, c.CloseDate, c.Duration, c.Budget, c.UId, c.SourceBr, c.Cur, c.Active, c.TS, c.CreatedUserId, c.CreatedDate, c.UpdatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate ) from MNMORM00017 as c where c.Acctno = :accountNo and c.LNo = :loanNo and c.Active = true and (c.CloseDate = null or c.CloseDate = '')

update MNMORM00017 l set l.IntRate = :interestRate, l.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, l.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate
where l.SourceBr = :sourcebr and l.Active = true
